nodes.text: Nellac Kram was planet in Outer Rim Territories in the Bon'nyuw-Luq sector. The New Republic freighter Nartissteu was based out of Nellac Kram.
By 25 ABY, Nellac Kram boasted a population of 100 million to 500 million sentients.
Nellac Kram was named by author Timothy Zahn after Mark Callen, a fan.
